availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Greenup County, Kentucky farm laborer. Kentucky native. Married Dorcas Smith. Father of Thomas R. Smith, Andrew J. Smith, and Amanda J. Smith.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Greenup County, District 1, p. 235. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Greenup County, p. 113. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Greenup County, Precinct 2, p. 10. “John Allan Smith (1825-1912),” Find A Grave, memorial no. 23958236, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=23958236&ref=acom (accessed June 15, 2017).
